node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #1567 及 #1683 宗個案患者的家人，過往健康良好，無外遊記錄，沒有病徵。
node.detail_en: The patient is a family member of patients #1567 and #1683, has good past health, no recent travel history, and no symptoms.
